posts.author: HillaryKnox
posts.post_text: October 7, 2015 at 7:32 PM#5Label @ <Please> will pop up a box for you to label the current cue of the currently selected Executor. If you're not in a cue in the currently selected Executor, it will label the Sequence assigned to the currently selected Executor.
